import { useState , useEffect } from "react"; function AddDocument(){ const token_access = localStorage.getItem('access'); const [titolo , setTitolo] = useState(''); const UploadDocument =(e)=>{ e.preventDefault() fetch ( 'api/upload_file/', { method : 'POST', headers : { 'Content-Type' : 'application/json', 'Authorization': `Bearer ${token_access}`, }, body : JSON.stringify({}) } ) } return(
{/* Titolo Field */}
); } export default AddDocument;
